channel.title: Looking for 1 server sided programmer. [pi]
channel.description:
I am looking for one person to help me code server sided, I need someone with experience as I want this in the end to be quite unique. This is what I have added so far.
Development of Lost Adoration; Coders -Frost- -Mitch-
Started on a blank pi using the rs2 #317 client 22/05/2013:
Started 22/05/2013:
Development so far;
-Mitch-23/05/2013- Added all npcs that possibly could be added as of right now. -Mitch-23/05/2013- Removed ALL shops and un-used objects for now like the Ancient Altar. -Mitch-23/05/2013- Implemented new crafting system. -Mitch-23/05/2013- Added FULL working GnomeGlider with every location.
Client Sided; -Frost-21/05/2013- Clipped player following.
Bug Fixes; -Frost-21/05/2013- Fixed a dueling bug where players couldn't attack each other.
Dupe Fixes; -Frost-21/05/2013- Fixed a simple dupe (players drop an item kill a monster exit client and reload it)
Additional Notes;
-Frost-21/05/2013- Made server more stable (Dropped Engine load from 32% to 1%)
If you would like to help please contact me on skype frost.rsrevamped Thank you for you time
